segments.text: I notice the little boy climbing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so high, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless he’s being—he’s going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout at her to turn around and stop him before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she’s just drying that plate, totally oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is flooding the floor, and she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a slow-motion accident about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone does something before it all goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
